fixed_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to 79.4%/83.4%/87.3% of Attack. Grant all allies 2 Blessing stacks. For each Blessing on user, increase skill damage by 5%, up to 25%.
fixed_skill.name: Shining Salvation

innate_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 154.5/162.2/170.0% of Attack.
innate_skill.name: Megaton Raid

innate_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to 1 foe equal to 90.6/99.3/108.0% of Attack. Low chance to deal a Bless insta-kill effect to foes with 50% or less HP. Increase chance based on foe's missing HP.
innate_skill.name: Hamaon

innate_skill.desc: Increase the success rate of insta-kill skills by 5.4%.
innate_skill.name: Divine Guidance III

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 24.9%. When using a skill, increase Bless damage by 3% for each Blessing stack on party for 2 turns, up to 8 Blessing stacks. Other Bless allies receive 50% of this effect.
passive_skill.name: Verdict of Justice

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 24.9%. When using a skill, increase Bless damage by 4% for each Blessing stack on party for 2 turns, up to 8 Blessing stacks. Other Bless allies receive 50% of this effect.
passive_skill.name: Verdict of Justice I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 24.9%. When using a skill, increase Bless damage by 4% for each Blessing stack on party for 2 turns, up to 8 Blessing stacks. Other Bless allies receive 50% of this effect. Increase Attack of allies with 3 or more Blessing stacks by 8% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Verdict of Justice II

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 24.9%. When using a skill, increase Bless damage by 4% for each Blessing stack on party for 2 turns, up to 8 Blessing stacks. Other Bless allies receive 50% of this effect. Increase Attack of allies with 3 or more Blessing stacks by 15% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Verdict of Justice III

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
